body.name: 64GB Hidden Camera DIY 1080P Mini Portable Spy Camera Covert Nanny Video Recorder with Motion Detection Security Cameras for Home, Office
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 9 mins
features: 💡💡This is a lightweight and portable mini hidden camera (Less:8mm , Weight:1.2oz ) for indoor and outdoor use.With 1000mAh, this mini camera can be used for about 5-6 hours. The mini camera can record continuously and also while charging.（※Tips: No WiFi. No APP）

💡💡Mini camera records video resolution in high-quality 1920x1080 pixels (interpolated) HD at 30 frames/sec, the whole picture of your house, even better in breathtaking clarity and vividness. It is perfect as surveillance cameras for home security.(※ No night vision)

💡💡The mini security camera supports card (up to 128GB.) and saves your videos on the card. Videos are saved separately every 10 minutes for easy reference and to record in a loop. The mini camera supports loop recording. When the card is full, the oldest video file will be automatically overwritten. You don't have to worry about the memory shortage.

💡💡When detecting moving objects, this mini security camera will automatically record, record 5-minute video and save to card. Mini camera only opens when motion is detected, making it easier for you to save storage space than other mini security cameras.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeds expectations! Finally a small and good quality camera for security and more!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this small camera and have been seriously impressed with its performance. Despite its really small size, which is even more compact than I initially expected from the phone, the camera delivers great picture quality. Not just great for the size, but overall great (unlike some other ones I tested). The setup process was straightforward, allowing me to use it without any issues. The instruction is written in a really simple language.The picture quality would be nothing without battery.... and battery life on it is great. It lasts significantly longer than other cameras I've tried, which is a huge advantage for continuous recording. The durability of the camera is another high point; it feels robust and well-built, capable of withstanding various conditions without any issues. IN the same time it's still compact and reasonably lightweight. I really like that....and with all that, it's also affordable! Overall, I'm extremely happy with this purchase and would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and install hidden camera
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The 64GB Hidden Camera DIY 1080P Mini Portable Spy Camera has proven to be an invaluable addition to my home security setup. Its discreet design, motion detection capabilities, and high-quality video recording make it an excellent choice for keeping an eye on my home and office.One of the standout features of this spy camera is its small and unobtrusive design. It’s incredibly compact and can be easily concealed in various settings, making it an ideal choice for covert surveillance. Whether I need to monitor my home or office, this camera blends seamlessly into the environment.The motion detection feature adds a layer of intelligence to its surveillance capabilities. It means that the camera only records when it detects movement, saving storage space and making it easier to review footage when necessary. This feature has been especially useful for keeping an eye on my home while I’m away.The video quality is impressive. The camera records in 1080P high definition, delivering clear and detailed footage. Even in low-light conditions, the camera performs well, thanks to its night vision capabilities. I appreciate that it can capture crucial details, which is essential for security purposes.The 64GB storage capacity provides ample space for recording and storing footage. It eliminates the need for frequent data retrieval or worrying about running out of storage during extended surveillance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Tiny Guardian
reviews.reviewText: If home security keeps you up at night, let me introduce the peacekeeper: the DIY Surveillance Camera. This unassuming little gadget is the silent sentinel you need, and it’s so simple to set upIt’s discreet. Place it anywhere, and it just looks like another trinket. But, oh, the wonders it does quietly! It records clear, sharp 1080P videos, making playback feel like you’re witnessing events live. And the motion detection? A game-changer. It ensures not a moment gets missed, recording everything once it senses movement, saving you the hassle of reviewing endless empty footage.Don’t fret over not having real-time viewing. Honestly, it’s a stress you don’t need. This cam records everything in your absence, and you can review the clips at your leisure, no risk of prying digital eyes. It’s security without the paranoia.Yes, it’s not flaunting ultra-smooth 60fps videos, but for security needs, the 30fps clarity is more than sufficient. You see every detail, every face, every action. And there’s no Wi-Fi setup or app downloads; it’s plug-and-play at its finest, keeping your digital footprint nil.The battery life deserves praise, too. Up to 6 hours of continuous recording means it's got your back most of the day (or night). And with support for storage expansion, what’s not to love?It’s an investment in peace of mind, a non-invasive way to ensure your sanctuary stays safe. A must-have for anyone considering a reliable, straightforward security solution. Five stars all the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars DIY spy camera that can be useful for many situations. Innovative idea!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a nice idea of having a surveillance camera with DIY capabilities. I have to say, it works & does the job as claimed. I am satisfied with this trial product and would recommend it for the price.My 2 cents are below:Pros:- Seems to be doing both the job pretty well. It is a functional product- Clear picture quality (1080P HD) with wide-angle capability- Has motion activation & saves the video clip to the SD card when detected- TF card slot has 128GB maximum support in these to store the recording locally. They bundle a 64GB card in the package- Inbuilt rechargeable battery that can provide backup for up to 6 hours- Good build quality- Simple but detailed instruction manual included for reference- Comes with many accessories including cable and card readerCons (Nothing I see for the charger functionality but a few for the camera):- Records at 30fps only and no option for smoother 60fps smoother video recording- It does not harm to have mobile app connectivity through WiFi. I wish it had that feature too so have a real-time live feed when needed
